-e ---

The most enigmatic Gothic character !

𓎡 ⋍ 𐌵 𓎡𓇋𓀁 ⋍ 𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 quoth qiz quatsch quasseln / tratschen / cross(talk) / dict!

𓎡 𓄿 𓀁 𓆑 quoth : he will say
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 sagt |relate, recount, talk (of)|
𓆓 𓂧 chat / said , (re)cite zitier sa'd sagt schade?|thought ⇔ search / ge'fasel: φασί ⇔ pthisi= ⋍ phrase
𓆓 𓂧 𓌃 𓏥||recitation|cite words ++ / chat unscharf! ßth ⇔ Schluss … -- / Schda Words / Stäbe / stabs / steps
𓆓 𓂧 𓌃 𓏤 𓏥||pronounced|cited-/ chat_ ➙ sayd

𐌵𐌹 : QV/TR/CR/Ghur > T,C,Q !

𐍃𐌰𐌼𐌰𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 samakrιss samacιss (zu)Sammenqiz/quetschen!/quasseln consensus,agreement,concurrence
𐍃𐌰𐌼𐌰𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 samtykke agreement (take,Tücke)

𐍅𐌰𐌹𐌻𐌰𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 weιlakrιss vaιlacιss WohlSegnung velsignelse benedizione blagoslov blessing ברכה brakha
